content:
{"name": "Human Needs Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Call in advane for services at (973) 746-4669
-  Essex county can come in once a week while the other counties can come in once a month.
-  Vaccines are needed for the diaper program which is aailable only to essex county residents
- They need only bring ID and proof of address. We serve all of Essex county on a once-a-week basis (except Newark. Newark is a major city with a lot of resources and we'd be overwhelmed trying to handle that city's residents) We serve all other counties in NJ on a once-a-month basis and provide them with listings for their counties.", "email": "", "url": "humanneedsfoodpantry.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "9 Label Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Montclair", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07042", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8180582, "longitude": -74.2115585}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 746-4669", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Toiletries, if available "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Delivery available for seniors & those adults with disabilities"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
